folder: Amboy Road & Annadale Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Amboy Road, north side, at its junction with Annadale Road, showing the Annadale Hotel. It belonged to A. Britton (1874 to 1887), and later (1898) to Wm. Smith. Still later it was the property of Mrs. L. Stacker (1907). The dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.

P. L. Sperr.

1923.

(1)

Seguine's Pond (Staten Island): The small pond on the former J. H. Seguine property, at Annadale. It is situated on the north side of Amboy Road, about 100 yards west of Annadale Road.

April 6, 1925

By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr

(2)

Another view, showing a muskrat home on the left.

March 7, 1925

P. L. Sperr
title: Seguine's Pond - Staten Island [Richmond - Amboy Road - Annadale Road.]
